component_libraries.name: Backlight
component_libraries.Description: With collaboration between developers and designers at heart, Backlight is a complete coding platform where teams build, document, publish, scale, and maintain Design Systems. The free plan allows up to 3 editors to work on one design system with unlimited viewers.

component_libraries.Description: Lunar UI is a collection of interactive Tailwind CSS components built for React and Vue.js.

component_libraries.Description: Beautiful UI components and templates to make your landing page look stunning.

component_libraries.name: React keepdesign
component_libraries.Description: Elevate your web projects with Keep React's 40+ customizable components. Access open-source resources for efficient development and bring your ideas to life with ease.

tools_for_create_components.name: Storybook
tools_for_create_components.Description: Storybook is a frontend workshop for building UI components and pages in isolation. Thousands of teams use it for UI development, testing, and documentation. It's open source and free.

fake_data_generators.name: Faker.js
fake_data_generators.Description: Generate massive amounts of fake (but reasonable) data for testing and development.

fake_data_generators.name: Mockaroo
fake_data_generators.Description: A free test data generator and API mocking tool - Mockaroo lets you create custom CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel datasets to test and demo your software.

SVG Resources.name: Feather
SVG Resources.Description: Feather is a collection of simply beautiful open source icons. Each icon is designed on a 24x24 grid with an emphasis on simplicity, consistency and readability.

SVG Resources.Description: Beautiful hand-crafted SVG icons, by the makers of Tailwind CSS.

SVG Resources.name: SVGL
SVG Resources.Description: A beautiful library with SVG logos

APIs de pago.name: Qonversion
APIs de pago.Description: All-in-one cross-platform subscription management platform offering analytics, A/B testing, Apple Search Ads, remote configs, and growth tools for optimizing in-app purchases and monetization. Compatible with iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, Cordova, Stripe, and web. Free up to $10k in monthly tracked revenue.

APIs de pago.name: Glassfy
APIs de pago.Description: In-app subscriptions infrastructure, real-time subscription events and out-of-the-box monetization tools on iOS, Android, Stripe and Paddle. Free up to $10k monthly revenue.

APIs de pago.name: Adapty
APIs de pago.Description: One-stop solution with open-source SDK for mobile in-app subscription integration to iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, or web app. Free up to $10k monthly revenue.

APIs de pago.name: RevenueCat
APIs de pago.Description: Hosted backend for in-app purchases and subscriptions (iOS and Android). Free up to $2.5k/mo in tracked revenue.

APIs de pago.name: Moesif
APIs de pago.Description: Generate revenue from APIs via usage-based billing. Connect to Stripe, Chargebee, etc. The free tier offers 30,000 events/month.

APIs de pago.name: Nami ML
APIs de pago.Description: Complete platform for in-app purchases and subscriptions on iOS and Android, including no-code paywalls, CRM, and analytics. Free for all base features to run an IAP business.
